name: erasable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a mark, word, message, etc.) possible to remove from a surface, a text, a disk, a tape, etc. : The school specifies that students should use black or blue erasable pens. erasable data
(of a surface, disk, etc.) possible to clear by removing marks, text, or information from it: The game comes with erasable white boards. They launched an erasable computer memory chip.
